# confirmationRequired(with:)

**Type Method**

Creates an object whose resolution requires confirmation from the user before proceeding.

## Declaration

```swift
class func confirmationRequired(with spatialEventTriggerToConfirm: INSpatialEventTrigger?) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **spatialEventTriggerToConfirm**: The object that resolves the request but must be confirmed by the user.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSpatialEventTriggerResolutionResult] object.

## Discussion

Use this method when you have to make assumptions about the location details specified by the user. Provide an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSpatialEventTrigger] object with the trigger details as you intend to apply them.

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified parameter.
- **disambiguation(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.
